I know what you mean by this point it's just getting repetitive it was funny at first but now you just think how far will he take it.

I'm starting to think that kon-kit doesn't care anymore about this series (beyond it being popular/profitable, obviously) It started like some cheating comedy thing, but unlike his other series that become more weird/complex or even spin off characters between them, but Kaya nee is losing complexity instead- at first, it was the "dark" of kon-kit's series, as a cheating-rape-netorare comedy of sorts (see? it was in to many dark fetishes) instead now its just about Kaya being a stupid cheating bitch, and nothing more. Yeah, it's funny here and there, and I guess it's popular because of that (and japanese fixation on married women)
If every single male partner would be like that we wouldn't have a single bad doujin, everything would be great. :/
